summary: ACICIA IS A LEVEL 81 DRAGONBORN QUEST COMPLETED HALFWAY THROUGH DARK BROTHERHOOD QUEST SAVE GAME , SHE IS LEVEL 100 HUNDRED IN ALMOST ALL SKILLS AND HAS PERKS FOR THEM , SHE HAS ALL SHOUTS AND SPELLS AND THE SHOUTS ALSO INCLUDE THE DEVELOPERS SHE HAS NO ARMOUR BUT HAS DAEDRIC WEAPONS. My caps froze sorry and i cant be bothered changing XD

Unp female body [ Skinny ] by dimon99 : http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?[/color]




[/size][color=#d5a6bd][size=6]About:[/size]
[/color][size=3][color=#d5a6bd]Are you done with trying to max rank? are you tired of finding amazing save games but crappy levels and no perks? 

Well look no further! 
Acicia the warrior is a level 81 almost all perks maxed save game , she has all spells and shouts [ Developer ones , but i don't recommend using them because it can cause crashes ] She does not start with any armour BUT she has daedric weapons and is level 100 smithing all perks. She has completed the dragonborn quest  [ NOT THE DLC VERSION ] and is halfway through the dark brotherhood quest         [ !SPOLIER!  Saved cicero and is on the quest to kill the gourmet ] [/color]

[/size]
